titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the recognition of July 2022 as "Muslim-American Heritage Month" and celebrating the heritage and culture of Muslim Americans in the United States.
A resolution expressing support for the recognition of July 2022 as "Muslim-American Heritage Month" and celebrating the heritage and culture of Muslim Americans in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates the month of July 2022 as Muslim-American Heritage Month.
The resolution also recognizes the need for public education, awareness, and policies that are culturally competent when describing, discussing, or addressing the impacts of being Muslim American in all aspects of the society of the United States, including in discourse and policy.
Finally, the resolution also honors the contributions and integral role of Muslim Americans in the economy, culture, and identity of the United States.
